department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Suzhou; black leaf design on lid; round, flat and white
medium:
Tz'u-chou ware
Stoneware with painted black decor on white slip
text: Tz'u-chou ware was adapted to a wide variety of utilitarian shapes. This simple cosmetic box is decorated with a freely brushed floral design.
title: Cosmetic Box
